game.name: Farmare: Ultimate Animal Survive
game.genres: 액션, 캐주얼, 인디, RPG, 앞서 해보기
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 음량 개별 조정, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: A survival roguelite RPG where you fight endless waves of enemies, gather upgrades on the fly, and grow your farm base stronger with every run.
game.shortDescriptionEn: A survival roguelite RPG where you fight endless waves of enemies, gather upgrades on the fly, and grow your farm base stronger with every run.
